articles.title: Ireland aim to impress again as two-match Test series against Sri Lanka beckons - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Returning to Test cricket after four years, Ireland made a solid impression in Bangladesh and are now hoping to put up a fight against Sri Lanka in Galle in the two-match Test series that begins on 16 April.
